entities: E3/EU+3 (China, France, Germany, the Russian Federation, the United Kingdom, and the United States)
reporting_cycle: The Director General of the IAEA to provide regular updates to the IAEA Board of Governors and, as appropriate, in parallel to the Security Council on Iranâ€™s implementation of its commitments under the JCPOA every six months
summary:
C. Implementation Day 
Implementation Day will occur upon IAEA-verified implementation by Iran of nuclear-related measures and E3/EU+3 actions. 
Iran will implement nuclear-related measures as specified in Annex I, including: 
- Arak Heavy Water Research Reactor 
- Heavy Water Production Plant 
- Enrichment Capacity 
- Centrifuges Research and Development 
- Fordow Fuel Enrichment Plant 
- Other Aspects of Enrichment 
- Uranium Stocks and Fuels 
- Centrifuge Manufacturing 
- Additional Protocol and Modified Code 3.1 
- Centrifuge Component Manufacturing Transparency 
Iran will complete measures within one year from Implementation Day.
The European Union will: 
16.1. Terminate/suspend provisions of Council Regulation (EU) No267/2012 and Council Decision 2010/413/CFSP specified in Sections 1.1.1-1.1.3; 1.1.5-1.1.8; 1.2.1-1.2.5; 1.3.1, 1.3.2 (Articles 16 and 17); 1.3.3; 1.4.1, 1.4.2; 1.10.1.2 (Articles 39, 43, 43a). 
16.2. Amend provisions of Council Regulation (EU) No267/2012 and Council Decision 2010/413/CFSP specified in Sections 1.6.1-1.7.2 of Annex II. 
16.3. Remove individuals/entities from Annexes VIII and IX to Council Regulation (EU)267/2012 and suspend provisions of Council Decision 2010/413/CFSP. 
16.4. Amend provisions to implement the relevant UN Security Council resolution.

The United States will: 
17.1. Cease application of sanctions set forth in Sections 4.1-4.5 and 4.7 of Annex II. 
17.2. Cease application of sanctions set forth in Section 4.6 of Annex II. 
17.3. Remove individuals/entities from the SDN List, FSE List, and/or Non-SDN Iran Sanctions Act List. 
17.4. Terminate Executive Orders. 
17.5. License activities as set forth in Section 5 of Annex II.

UN Security Council: 
18.1. Terminate provisions imposed in previous UNSC resolutions subject to re-imposition in case of significant non-performance by Iran. 
18.2. The E3/EU+3 will implement the new UNSC resolution.

Transition Day: 
19. Occur 8 years from Adoption Day or upon IAEA report.

The European Union will: 
20.1. Terminate/suspend provisions of Council Regulation (EU) No267/2012 and Council Decision 2010/413/CFSP. 
20.2. Remove individuals/entities from Annexes VIII and IX. 
20.3. Remove individuals/entities from Annexes I and II. 
20.4. Terminate all suspended provisions.
